orbotix.sphero
Interface ConnectionListener

public interface ConnectionListener

Handles Connection, Connection Failed, and Disconnect events created by:

  • RobotProvider.startDiscovery()
    • or the UI Version
  • SpheroConnectionView.startDiscovery()

Method Summary
 void onConnected(Robot sphero)
          Invoked when Sphero is connected & ready for commands
 void onConnectionFailed(Robot sphero)
          Invoked when Sphero fails to complete a connect request
 void onDisconnected(Robot sphero)
          Invoked when Sphero disconnects for any reason
